snippet: Attorney General Eric Holder should show that the Justice Department has the will to discipline rogue lawyers in its ranks.
abstract: Editorial urges Atty Gen Eric Holder to appoint independent counsel to investigate conduct of federal prosecutors who made hostile comments on Web site about defendants in case they were pursuing, and then lied about it; notes case is against former New Orleans police officers convicted of shooting unarmed citizens after Hurricane Katrina.
lead_paragraph: Attorney General Eric Holder should show that the Justice Department has the will to discipline rogue lawyers in its ranks.
